description: The Painkiller Drink is a fruity alcoholic cocktail that was first mixed in the 1970s. The cocktail is made with pineapple juice, orange juice, coconut cream, and&nbsp;rum. It's perfect for those who like their drinks on the sweeter side.
name: Painkiller Drink

recipeInstructions.name: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, add the rum, pineapple juice, orange juice, and cream of coconut.
recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, add the rum, pineapple juice, orange juice, and cream of coconut.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed or cracked ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed or cracked ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with grated nutmeg and pineapple wedge on top.
